meanings.definition: A person or thing that is old or aged.
meanings.sent1: My grandma's cat is an oldie who loves to nap in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The antique clock in the living room is a real oldie.
meanings.sent3: The oldie tree in the backyard has seen many seasons come and go.
meanings.sent4: The oldie book on the shelf whispered stories of the past.
meanings.sent5: The oldie house on the corner creaked with history and memories.

meanings.definition: A song, movie, or other form of entertainment that is considered to be old-fashioned or nostalgic.
meanings.sent1: My mom loves listening to oldies on the radio during road trips.
meanings.sent2: The classic film is definitely an oldie but a goodie.
meanings.sent3: The oldie song playing at the party got everyone dancing.
meanings.sent4: The oldie movie brought back memories of childhood adventures.
meanings.sent5: The oldie record player filled the room with sweet melodies from the past.
